name: Retro_Navy_Curved_Arm_Accent_Chair
reviews: We purchased this accent chair for our bedroom and it's perfect for the space! Easy to assemble (just attach the legs). Very soft fabric. No complaints!

I purchased two of these for my living room. Assembly was very easy. Both have a little wobble I can't determine if it is my floor or uneven legs. Nothing a little felt adhesives can't cover though. Overall very happy. Beautiful rich color and soft fabric. Gave my drab room some color.

These chairs are beautiful! I bought two of them and really love them. The only negative thing I have to say is they are not very comfortable unless you have a nice pillow on them. But they truly are beautiful

I bought 2 chairs to go into our home office and I have to say I am very pleased. With the wrap around back makes these chairs cozy and very comfortable to sit in. The navy blue is true to color on the screen. I can see I will be spending a lot of time in here chatting with my husband while he works!
Not as sturdy as I would have liked, but it worked for what I needed it to.
the deep navy blue is gorgeous. it's sturdy and was super easy to put together.
Looks good in our retro family room. Fairly comfortable for a very reasonable price.
This chair is wonderful, well priced and presents well.
This chair is so gorgeous! The navy is very rich and striking! I am so happy with my purchase. I'm glad I purchased two. They are stunning in my living room! Very sleek!
I love these chairs they give my space a modern feel. The only downside is the chairs are short but they work great for my space. I purchased 2 of them.
description:
This retro accent chair makes a classy statement in any living
room, waiting room or office. The mid-century design and strong
navy blue color give this piece a timeless appeal, enhanced by the
welt cord finish and buttoned, tufted back. The solid wood frame
and foam-filled upholstery provide both durability and comfort,
making this piece a valuable and convenient addition to any room. Non-mar foot glidesButton tufted on chair backStylish welt cord detailSet includes: One (1) chairMaterials: Solid wood, plywood, fabric, foamFinish: Medium walnutUpholstery color: Navy blueUpholstery fill: FoamSeat dimensions: 23 inches wide x 23 inches deep x 17 inches
  highDimensions: 29 inches wide x 29 inches deep x 31 inches
